name: The viking duck game
description:
This game is made for the Nordic gamejam 2022, where we've gotten the two themes emotion: awe and random: Nordic

Based on these two themes we present: The viking duck game! 

This game is a local multiplayer which uses controller inputs. The players plays as a nordic viking and a small duck and they have to work together to get through the obsictals in their path. 

Controls: Duck:

  • Left joystick - move
  • Left Trigger - to pick up duck/ throw

Controls: Viking:

  • Left joystick - move
  • Right joystick - to aim a throw
  • Left Trigger - to pick up duck/ throw

NOTE

All music and soundeffects within the game is from freesound.org - We haven't made any of it.

  • Music: https://freesound.org/people/BloodPixelHero/sounds/620451/#
  • Walk:  https://freesound.org/people/Connersaw64/sounds/199823/
